articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Anju Area Coal Mining Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Anju Area Coal Mining Complex
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Anju Area Coal Mining Complex.
					 He first looked round the monument to the field guidance given by President Kim Il Sung and the Revolutionary Museum.
					
					 The complex has turned into a large-scale coal producer under the wise guidance of the President and his meticulous care, he said, adding that the immortal revolutionary exploits of the President will shine long with the coalfield.
					
					 After being briefed on the complex in front of a map showing a panoramic view of the development of the coal mines, he went round various places of the complex including the cutting face of the Hwaphung Coal Mine to learn in detail about the preparations for reenergizing the production, the long-term plan for the development of the complex and the coal production there. 
					
					 Noting that the complex has a very important duty and role to perform as it plays a big role in building a great prosperous and powerful nation, he advanced important tasks which would serve as guidelines for developing the coal mines under a long-term plan. 
					
					 The immediate task facing the complex is to complete the preparations for sharply increasing the coal production in a short span of time, he said. 
					
					 In order to reenergize the coal production and steadily boost the production capacity it is necessary to conduct a vast work including the work to keep cutting faces in good order, he said, indicating the orientation and ways to do so.
					
					 Noting that whether to satisfactorily meet the ever-growing need for coal or not largely depends on the complex, he set forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the complex to this end.
					
					 He stressed that what is most important for sharply increasing the coal production is to put the modernization and scientification of the coal mines on to a high level.
					
					 In order to successfully wind up the vast technological updating of the complex in a brief span of time it is imperative to boost the state support to it, he said, stressing the need for the ministries and national institutions including the Cabinet to energetically push forward the work at the coal mines and help them.
					
					 If the complex is to boost the production of quality coal it is necessary for it to push ahead with the modernization of the cutting faces and, at the same time, intensify the scientific researches into this domain, he said.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the colliers of Anju would dash like the wind in the van of the drive for bringing about a new great revolutionary surge, keeping pace with the steel producers of Kangson, and thus exalt their honor of being builders of a great prosperous and powerful nation and perform exploits in the drive. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Kusong Machine-Tool Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Kusong Machine-Tool Plant
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il field guidance to the Kusong Machine-Tool Plant.
					 After being briefed on the modernization of the plant, he looked round the assembling shop and other processes and newly manufactured machine tools. Then he acquainted himself in detail with the progress made in the technological updating and modernization and production there.
					
					 He learned in detail about the performance, mechanism and operational principles of the newly invented and manufactured machine tools. He highly praised the feats performed by the workers of the plant, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they have produced many efficient machine tools by displaying all their wisdom and enthusiasm as required by the new century. 
					
					 The appearance of the plant has undergone a radical change in a few years thanks to the devoted efforts of its officials, workers and technicians, he said, adding that the Kusong Machine-Tool Plant where all its production processes have been put on a high modern and scientific basis and cultured practices are on a high level in production and life is a model plant in the era of Songun where the WPK's ideal has come true.
					
					 He noted that if persevering efforts are made with priority given to the scientific and technological development just as the workers of the above-said plant did, it is possible to successfully carry out the work to put the national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis in a brief span of time and accomplish the cause of building a thriving nation earlier than scheduled, calling upon all sectors and units to follow their example.
					
					 Saying that the plant has an important role to play for the development of the nation's economy, he set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the plant. 
					
					 The demand for machine tools is greater than ever today when a dynamic drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation is under way, he said, underlining the need for the plant to boost the production and supply of modern machine tools needed by different fields of the national economy.
					
					 Underlining the need to steadily improve the quality of products as machine tools are important means which constitute the backbone of the machine-building revolution, he stressed that to this end it is necessary to continue focusing efforts on producing high-speed, precision and modern machine tools. 
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the workers of the plant would set a clear long-term goal to bring the machine-building industry to a higher stage and wage a strenuous drive to hit the goal and thus creditably perform their honorable mission as pioneers and vanguard in the scientific and technological development. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Phyong Hae, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: 5th Scientific and Technological Exhibition Held
articles.content:
5th Scientific and Technological Exhibition Held
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The 5th scientific and technological exhibition in the field of machine designing took place at the Grand People's Study House from Mar. 24 to 27.
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were designs for developing new products, three-dimensional optimization designs and other machine designs and different kinds of programs for computer-aided designing, various kinds of e-mail files for aiding designing and  research data, etc.
					
					 Attracting the attention of the participants were designs of machine products developed in an indigenous way, general assembly diagrams, successes made in developing the computer data bases and experience gained in modernizing the designing means and tools.

articles.title: "World Tuberculosis Day" Observed
articles.content:
"World Tuberculosis Day" Observed
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A function observing the "World Tuberculosis Day" (March 24) was held in the People's Palace of Culture in Pyongyang.
					 Present there were officials of the Ministry of Public Health and public health institutions and members of the World Health Organization and the International Federation of the Red Cross and the Red Crescent Societies active in the DPRK.
					
					 A hygienic lecture for the prevention of tuberculosis was given at the function, which was followed by a photo exhibition.
					
					Meanwhile, colorful propaganda activities were conducted across the country in accordance with the tag line for this year "I am stopping TB" on the occasion of the day.

articles.title: Famous Works Serving as Precious Guideline in Adding Lustre to National Character
articles.content:
Famous Works Serving as Precious Guideline in Adding Lustre to National Character
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean people, under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, have regarded the application of the national character in all spheres of social life as well as the Juche character as an important work for the independent development of the nation and held fast to it with consistency.
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il has guided the work of preserving and glorifying the national character from the period of waging the revolutionary activities in Kim Il Sung University.
					
					He made public the famous work "The Cultural Wealth Achieved by the Ancestors Should Be Treasured" on March 27, Juche 50 (1961).
					
					In the work he noted that in conveying the history and culture of the country to the posterity, the fine cultural wealth made by the ancestors serves as an important mean for giving rise to patriotism of the people and raising their national pride.
					
					He also stressed that the fine cultural wealth such as Koryo porcelain, Rijo Sillok (Chronicles of the Ri Dynasty) and metallic types created by the ancestors shows the outstanding wisdom and talent of the Korean people and that the Koreans should have a high pride of them and value them. His work serves as a valuable guideline in keeping the national character.
					
					He authored the famous work "On Proper Evaluation and Treatment of the Cultural Heritage of Our Nation with a Correct Viewpoint and Attitude" and other works in the 1970s and many works such as "Let Us Give Full Play to the Korean Nation-First Spirit", "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" and "On Developing the National Music in Line with Modern Aesthetic Sense" in the 1980s and 1990s. In the works he gave clear-cut answers to the problems arising in preserving and glorifying the national traditions.
					
					In his work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" he clarified the issues of maintaining the standpoint of loving the country and nation, carrying on the revolution and construction in one's own way and raising the national pride, and put forth the tasks and ways for preserving the Juche character and national character and achieving the prosperity and development of the country.
					
					Besides, the famous works including "The National Food Should Be Positively Encouraged and Developed" and "On Positively Keeping Alive the Fine National Traditions of Our People" which he made public in the days of the Songun revolutionary leadership constitute the priceless guideline for preserving and glorifying the national character. They are also encouraging the Korean people in their efforts to achieve the great prosperity of the socialist nation and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, loudly sounding the bugle of the general advance.

articles.title: New Upsurge of Korean Revolution Provided by Yaoyinggou Meeting
articles.content:
New Upsurge of Korean Revolution Provided by Yaoyinggou Meeting
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean people with deep emotion are looking back upon the historic Yaoyinggou meeting held under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of its 74th anniversary. 
					 The Japanese imperialists perpetrated the "punitive" operations persistently to exterminate the people in the anti-Japanese bases, encircling the guerrilla zones double and treble with huge armed forces.
					
					 The enemy committed all sorts of the subversive activities to split and disintegrate the revolutionary ranks in a pernicious way, while tightening the control over the food lest that a little amount of grain might be supplied to the guerilla zones.
					
					 All these were aimed at isolating the anti-Japanese bases completely from the human world and stifling and reducing them to ashes thoroughly.
					
					 If efforts were directed only to defending the already-exposed guerrilla zones under these circumstances as some people said, the revolutionary army would stand on the defensive militarily, be inveigled into the enemy's persistent war of attrition and would not preserve the revolutionary forces trained for years. 
					
					 The President, who penetrated into the prevailing situation with his unusual wisdom, convened a meeting of military and political cadres of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army in Yaoyinggou on March 27, Juche 24 (1935) at which he delivered the historic speech "On Relinquishing the Guerrilla Zones and Advancing over Wide Areas".
					
					 The President in the speech set forth the strategic line on relinquishing the guerrilla zones and advancing over wide areas and concrete tasks for implementing the line.
					
					 He added that in order to carry out the work for dismissing the guerrilla zones well, it was necessary to explain widely the line among the people in the guerrilla bases so that they might have a correct understanding of the evacuation and willingly participate in it.
					
					 He said that the youths and children from among the masses in the guerrilla bases educated and tempered in the revolutionary organizations such as paramilitary organization should be enlisted in the KPRA to reinforce its forces.
					
					 He also stressed that they should send the people who had been educated, awakened and revolutionized in the guerrilla bases to the enemy-ruled areas so as to arouse vigorously the people there to the anti-Japanese struggle. 
					
					 After the historic Yaoyinggou meeting the KPRA went over to a new struggle of strategic attack from that of strategic defence and gave a telling political and military blow to the Japanese imperialists by waging the large unit guerilla warfare actively in vast areas.

articles.title: Dismantlement of Imperialists' Overseas Military Bases Demanded
articles.content:
Dismantlement of Imperialists' Overseas Military Bases Demanded
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- It is an important task facing the world peace-loving people at present to check and foil the imperialists' moves for reinforcing their overseas military bases for aggression and get them dismantled.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a by-lined article.
					
					 The imperialists' overseas military bases are operating as military strategic strongholds for implementing their policy of strength and the forces stationed there are playing the role of a shock brigade for aggression, the article notes, and says:
					
					 The daily mounting movement for independence against imperialism and a serious economic crisis that hit the world, etc. have thrown the imperialists into a tight corner. They are trying to seek a way out of this in aggression and war.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that the imperialists are busy setting up new military bases overseas or expanding the existing ones in a bid to contain the hostile countries, secure fuel and raw materials badly needed by them and put areas rich in major resources and military strongholds under their control, the article goes on to say:
					
					 The above-said bases are dangerous powder magazines and basic sources of a war of aggression. It is a criminal act of infringing upon the national dignity and sovereignty of other countries for the imperialists to operate their military bases for aggression in those countries.
					
					 The state sovereignty and the national dignity are infringed upon and violated in those countries which host those military bases and their people are suffering misfortune and pain. This is clearly evidenced by the reality of south Korea.
					
					 The above-mentioned facts indicate that the imperialists' operation of their military bases for aggression in other countries and their moves to expand them are doing serious harm to the efforts to ensure peace and security in the world and humankind's existence and the development of its civilization.
					
					 It is impossible to ensure peace and security in the world and protect the sovereignty and dignity of countries and nations nor is it possible to expect people's safety and the development of civilization unless the imperialists dismantle their military bases overseas.
					
					 The global peace and security can be lasting and durable only when the imperialists' bases and means for aggression and war are completely eliminated from the world.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Assailed
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group's anti-DPRK "human rights" racket is nothing but a treacherous row as it escalates confrontation and pushes the inter-Korean relations to a more dangerous phase, says Minju Joson Friday in a signed commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 At a recent meeting of the UN Human Rights Council the group slandered the DPRK, letting a spate of rubbish expressing "serious concern" and "urging actions to improve the human rights situation". The group even begged the U.S. secretary of State on a visit to south Korea to "cooperate" with it as regards the "human rights issue" in the DPRK. Such acts are absolutely intolerable as they are a revelation of dependence on outsiders and treachery inciting confrontation among Koreans.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the Lee group is plugging even the despicable human scum that had betrayed their parents and wives and children into the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.
					
					 This evidently proves that the smear campaign launched by the group over the above-said "human rights issue" is no more than a trite farce intended to hurt the daily mounting dignity and prestige of the DPRK and do harm to fellow countrymen in league with outsiders.
					
					 As mentioned above, the Lee group does not have even the slightest intention to improve the inter-Korean relations but only seeks to stifle the DPRK in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 The present reality substantially testifies to the fact that as long as the Lee group is allowed to stay in power the north-south dialogue and the normalization of the relations would be unthinkable.
					
					 In order to improve the inter-Korean relations it is necessary for all the Koreans to launch a more dynamic nationwide struggle against the Lee group rushing headlong into sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never allow anyone to infringe upon its dignified socialist system even a bit but will strongly react against the provocation.
					
					 The Lee group should clearly understand that its anti-DPRK "human rights" ruckus will only precipitate its own destruction.

articles.title: Korean Working Class Called upon to Fully Display Its Militant Stamina
articles.content:
Korean Working Class Called upon to Fully Display Its Militant Stamina
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean working class should perform heroic feats in the on-going worthwhile advance, keenly aware of the noble mission and duty it has assumed before the country, the revolution and the times and history.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an editorial.
					
					 The working class is the main player in the DPRK's glorious history of a great surge and acts a main unit for building an economic power, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK should fling open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. The Korean working class should play the role of a shock force in this worthwhile advance.
					
					 The Korean working class has made an immortal heroic epic, always taking the lead in upholding the Party and the leader since the very day of building a new country.
					
					 It was the Korean working class which held high the torch of a great Chollima upswing under the leadership of Kim Il Sung in the 1950s. It was again the working class, a powerful unit, which performed labor exploits to shine long in the nation's history in the grand drives to build socialism in the 1970s and the 1980s when the sounding of the revolution rocked the country. The Korean people remember the feats performed by the workers in Jagang Province and those of the Songjin Steel Complex and the Ranam Mining Machine Complex in successfully weathering the adversity during "the Arduous March," the forced march and ushering in a new era of building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 It is great pride and honor of Songun Korea to have a large contingent of revolutionary and heroic workers who are ready to wholeheartedly respond to the call of the country, boundlessly faithful to the cause of the Party and the leader.
					
					 Really profound and great are the Workers' Party of Korea's trust and expectation for the working class today when an all-out charge is under way to build a thriving nation.
					
					 In this great exciting era, the era of great leap forward, the Korean working class should fully display its heroic mettle and indomitable mental power as it was steeled in the crucible of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Idea of "By Our Nation Itself"
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Remain True to Idea of "By Our Nation Itself"
 Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The idea of "By our nation itself" serves as a powerful ideological and moral weapon for promoting the cause of the country's reunification, guided by the spirit of national independence and national unity.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 The idea of "By our nation itself" enshrined in the historic June 15 joint declaration is a basic idea of national reunification as it helps promote national independence and unity, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 The history of the development of the inter-Korean relations since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration goes to prove that "By our nation itself" represents noble patriotic spirit which guides the Koreans to achieve the country's reunification and prosperity common to the nation through national independence and unity. The Korean nation's movement for the country's reunification has turned into a nation-wide patriotic movement and a mass struggle irrespective of ideology and ism. This reality clearly indicates that the idea of "By our nation itself" is a just idea reflecting the unanimous aspiration and desire of all the Koreans for the independent reunification, peace and prosperity and immortal guidelines to be invariably held fast to accomplish the cause of reunification.
					
					 The above-said idea serves as a powerful driving force for meeting the blatant challenge of the anti-reunification forces hell-bent on sycophancy and dependence upon outside forces and reenergizing the movement for national reunification.
					
					 The shameless sycophancy of the traitors to the nation and their dependence upon foreign forces are throwing a big hurdle in the way of the movement for national reunification. This fact requires all the compatriots in the north and the south and overseas to regard the idea of "By our nation itself" as the basic idea of the movement for national reunification and intensify the movement for fully supporting and embodying the idea.
					
					 Not matter how desperately the separatists at home and abroad may work, they can never deter the June 15 era of reunification from advancing under the banner of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The idea of "By our nation itself" is cherished deep in the hearts of all the Koreans as the spirit of the times and the idea of reunification and patriotism, and they are growing stronger in their will to emerge victorious in the cause of national reunification by weathering difficulties and trials under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself."

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Confrontation Hysteria under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Confrontation Hysteria under Fire in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Social Progress, the Confederation of Trade Unions and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference in front of the puppet Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade on March 23 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' moves to participate in the "PSI."
					 In a press release the organizations accused the Lee Myung Bak regime of talking about the participation in the "PSI" under the pretext of the DPRK's projected satellite launch.
					
					 The press release branded such move of the Lee regime as a reckless act to spark off a military conflict on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It charged that the "PSI" is the U.S.-led mechanism set up to stifle and blockade the DPRK.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee regime dares talk about its participation in the "PSI", it said, adding that this is aimed at perpetrating more undisguised hostile acts against the DPRK and, at the same time, carrying out the strategy for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on it.
					
					 It demanded the Lee regime stop at once its moves to participate in the illegal "PSI" which may trigger off an all-out war on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Repressive Action Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Repressive Action Flayed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils issued a statement on March 23 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its repressive action.
					 The statement accused the security authorities of detaining Kim Thae Yon, section chief of the All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan, on March 20 on the charge of the violation of the "law on assembly and demonstration".
					
					 It said that unpardonable is the tyrannical action taken by the Lee Myung Bak regime to put in custody the member of the said committee by branding his just activities as "illegal" despite the resentment of all the people at the moves of the authorities to conceal their murder of evacuees.
					
					 Stressing that the tragedy in Ryongsan was obviously a man-killing operation carried out by the fascist police to brutally suppress the protesters at the instigation of the Lee Myung Bak regime, the statement urged the authorities to set free the member of the committee at once.

articles.title: Joint Meeting Held in India to Commemorate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Joint Meeting Held in India to Commemorate Day of Sun
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting was held by the International Institute of the Juche Idea, the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea and Indian organizations for the study of the Juche idea on Mar. 20 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the meeting hall were works of the peerlessly great persons, photos showing their immortal exploits and books introducing the advantages of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Present there were Vishwanath, director-general of the IIJI, and Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, Harish Gupta, secretary general of the ARIJI, Balzor Singh Chauhan, chairman of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung, and S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, and other members of organizations for the study of the Juche idea.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in India.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The secretary general of the ARIJI said that Kim Il Sung, who was born into a revolutionary family, embarked on the road of revolution in his early years to retake the country usurped by the Japanese imperialists and made great contributions to the Korean revolution and the world revolution, adding that the world progressive mankind is highly praising him as the outstanding leader in the 20th century.
					
					He noted that General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the sun of the 21st century, is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche started by the President.
					
					 Kim Jong Il who realized the cause of perpetuating the memory of the President is leading to victory the struggle of the Korean people to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in 2012 that marks the centenary of the birth of the President, he said, stressing:
					
					 It is thanks to the unique Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il that the DPRK has unswervingly advanced along the road chosen by itself in spite of the imperialist allied forces' anti-DPRK and anti-socialist moves.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted there.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Published in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Published in Iran
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Vol. 2 of Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution of President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" was published by the Lassa Culture Service Organization in Iran on Mar. 18.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza nuevo intento de cuestionar lanzamiento de satellite
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza nuevo intento de cuestionar lanzamiento de satelite
 Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ATCC) -- En entrevista exclusiva con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea en cuanto a su declaracion del 24 de marzo que aclaro la posicion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio el dia 26 como sigue:
					  En aquella declaracion advertimos severamente que si se comete en nombre del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU la accion hostil de negar el derecho al uso pacifico del espacio y atentar la soberania de nuestro pais, esto significaria que ese mismo aparato de la ONU esta rehusando la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre.
					
					  Pero, algunos medios de prensa reportan ahora con comentarios a su capricho que las acciones hostiles del Consejo de Seguridad se limitan solo a las duras medidas como la aprobacion de la "sancion" o la "resolucion" anti-RPDC.
					
					 Detras de esta campana publicitaria esta la astuta artimana de las fuerzas hostiles de censurar, a toda costa, el lanzamiento de satelite por nuestro pais en nombre del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU eludiendo la responsabilidad por las consecuencias de ello.
					
					 Les hacemos recordar una vez mas que si bien no son pocos en este mundo los paises que lanzan satelites, el Consejo de Seguridad nunca habia abordado ni cuestionado este problema de algun otro pais.
					
					 Si el Consejo de Seguridad circula algun documento, sea "declaracion presidencial" o "gaceta", que contenga una sola palabra de censura al lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos de nuestro pais, o plantea y aborda este asunto, esto significaria una flagrante accion hostil contra nuestro pais.
					
					  Desde el momento en que la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre fuera denegada debido a tal accion hostil, no existiran mas las conversaciones a 6 bandas, volvera a su punto de partida todo el proceso de avance de hasta ahora hacia la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y se tomaran fuertes medidas necesarias.

articles.title: Celebran en Corea "Dia mundial de la tuberculosis"
articles.content:
Celebran en Corea "Dia mundial de la tuberculosis"
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto  dedicado al "Dia mundial de la tuberculosis" (24 de marzo).
					  En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios del Ministerio de Salud Publica y de esta rama, los miembros de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud  acreditados en Corea y de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja quienes trabajan en nuestro pais.
					
					  Tuvieron lugar la conferencia de la higiene y la exposicion de fotos alusivas a la prevencion de la tuberculosis.
					
					  Por otra parte, con motivo de esa efemeride, se efectuaron en distintas partes del pais variadas actividades de propaganda concernientes al tema del 2009 "Yo mismo tengo que prevenir la transmision de la tuberculosis".

articles.title: Ministerio de Cultura de China dona a Corea vestidos de actrices
articles.content:
Ministerio de Cultura de China dona a Corea  vestidos  de  actrices
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Ministerio de Cultura de China dono los vestidos de los artistas que actuan en la Opera "Hong Lu Meng" creandose en Corea.
					  Este ano en que se cumple el 60o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre Corea y China, el Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre representa conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo la Opera "Hong Lu Meng" que se funcionaba en la decada de 1960 tras adaptar la famosa novela clasica de China.
					
					  China dono los vestidos de los protagonistas, actores secundarios y bailadores quienes se  representan en varias danzas en forma de flor del loto y de mariposa.
					
					  Esta opera contribuira a adornar singularmente el "Ano de Amistad Corea-China" y a desarrollar las relaciones de amistad de los pueblos de ambos paises.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun demanda eliminar las bases militares en ultramar
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun demanda eliminar las bases militares en ultramar
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ATCC) -- En la actualidad, los pueblos pacifistas del mundo tienen la importante tarea de cerrar las bases militares, que los imperialistas instalaron en ultramar para la agresion, al detener y frustrar las maniobras para consolidarlas.
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 27 y continua:
					
					  Las bases militares de los imperialistas en ultramar devienen los puntos estrategicos para realizar su politica de garrote y las fuerzas armadas estacionadas en ellas son la avanzada de la agresion.
					
					  Debido a la cada dia mas fuerte corriente de la independencia antiimperialista y a la seria crisis economica que azota el mundo, los imperialistas estan empantanandose en el atolladero.
					
					  Ellos buscan la salida de esta crisis en la agresion y la guerra.
					
					  Los imperialistas instalan nuevamente y amplian sus bases militares en otros paises a fin de mantener a raya a los paises hostiles, asegurar el combustible y las materias primas mas necesitados y tomar en su mano las zonas con ricos yacimientos de recursos naturales y los puntos militarmente importantes.
					
					  Esas facilidades son peligrosos polvorines y fuentes de las guerras de agresion.
					
					  En todos los paises, donde existen ellas, son violadas flagrantemente la soberania y la dignidad nacionales y los pueblos sufren indecibles desgracias y penalidades.
					
					  Un buen ejemplo de ello, es la realidad del Sur de Corea.
					
					  Los hechos demuestran que las maniobras arriba referidas de los imperialistas amenazan gravemente la paz y la seguridad del mundo, la existencia y la civilizacion de la humanidad.
					
					  Sin eliminar esos establecimientos, no se puede asegurar la paz y la seguridad del mundo ni defender la soberania y la dignidad del pais y la nacion ni esperar la seguridad de la vida y el desarrollo de civilizacion de los pueblos.
					
					  Cuando se eliminen completamente las bases y los medios de agresion y guerra de los imperialistas en la Tierra, seran eternas y solidas la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
